attributes.action: Bring back Borstal for young offenders
attributes.additional_details:
I think the Government should look at bringing back the Borstal system instead of the Young Offenders Institutes.
Youngsters would think twice about offending if they knew they might end up in Borstal.
I want the Government to seriously discuss and toughen up our Young Offenders Institutes and make them deterrents.
